akn:content.akn:p: (a) Regulations Within six months after September 18, 1978, the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating shall issue regulations which require that any vessel, rig, platform, or other vehicle or structure—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Exceptions from design, construction, alteration, and repair requirements

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Exceptions from design, construction, alteration, and repair requirements The regulations issued under subsection (a)(2) of this section shall not apply to any vessel, rig, platform, or other vehicle or structure built prior to September 18, 1978, until such time after such date as such vehicle or structure is rebuilt.
